name: Just A Cube 3D
description:
Just A Cube 3D is a 3D platform runner game where you are a cube and you have to avoid various obstacles. 

The game also has a feature of high score. 

So are you ready to beat your own high score every single time you play the game? :)

Also, this is my very first project so there are a couple of bugs in the game too. I'll try to fix them soon:)

Peace:)
